# 307 # U01 # The Second World War
event = {
	id = 307
	random = no
	country = U01

	name = "The Second World War"
	desc = "Desc: TODO"
	style = 2
	picture = "petain"

	date = { day = 18 month = january year = 1948 }
	offset = 5
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1990 }

	action = {
		ai_chance = 100
		name = "A tragical outcome"
		command = { type = dissent value = 1 }
	}
}

# 308 # U01 # De Gaulle's Appeal
event = {
	id = 308
	country = U01
	persistent = yes
	style = 2
	picture = "Appel_de_Gaulle"

	trigger = {
		day = 18
		month = 5
		NOT = {
			day = 19
		}
		NOT = {
			month = 6
		}
	}

	date = { day = 0 month = may year = 1948 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }

	name = "The 18 June Appeal"
	desc = "June 18, 1940, General De Gaulle launched his appeal to the Resistance from London. Since then, each year volunteers rally to Free France"

	action = {
		name = "Vive la France Libre !"
		command = { type = dissent value = -1 }
		command = { type = add_division value = militia }
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = 10 }
	}
}

# 309 # U01 # The departments
event = {
	id = 309
	random = no
	country = U01
	style = 2
	picture = "news_paper"

	trigger = {
		exists = FRA
		NOT = {
			ispuppet = U01
			atwar = U01
		}
		random = 70
	}

	name = "New departments organization"
	desc = "After the Fall of mainland France in 1940, the Free French governement has regained a part of de jure metropolitan territories, the departments of Algeria,Tunisia,Morocco,Equatorial Africa and Central-South Africa. Shall we plan a new organization of these territories ?"

	date = { day = 15 month = september year = 1948 }
	offset = 25
	deathdate = { day = 1 month = december year = 1960 }

	action = {
		ai_chance = 99
		name = "It's absolutely necessary"

		command = { type = set_domestic which = freedom value = 7  }
		command = { type = setflag which = Departments }
		command = { type = money value = -500  }
		command = { type = dissent value = 10 }
	}

	action = {
		ai_chance = 1
		name = "It's not necessary"

		command = { type = setflag which = NotDepartments }
		command = { type = dissent value = 30 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = freedom value = 10  }

		#Algeria
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 727 value = 25  } #Algeri
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 728 value = 25  }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 729 value = 25  }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 730 value = 25  }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 731 value = 25  }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 732 value = 25  }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 733 value = 25  }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 734 value = 25  }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 735 value = 25  }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 736 value = 25  }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 743 value = 25  }

		command = { type = wakeminister which = 820091 }
		command = { type = wakeminister which = 820092 }
		command = { type = wakeleader which = 820097 }

		command = { type = money value = -1000  }
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = -100 }
		command = { type = energypool value = -1000 }
	}
}


# 310 # U01 # The department of Algeria
event = {
	id = 310
	random = no
	country = U01
	style = 2
	picture = "news_paper"

	decision = {
		NOT = {
			exists = ALG
		}
		flag = Departments
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		NOT = { war = { country = U01 country = FRA } }
		flag = Departments
	}

	trigger = {
		exists = FRA
		NOT = {
			ispuppet = U01
			atwar = U01
		}
		random = 70
		flag = Departments
	}

	name = "The department of Algeria"
	desc = "After the Fall of mainland France in 1940, the Free French governement has regained a part of de jure metropolitan territories: the departements of Algeria. Howewer, the locals indigenous, if not hostiles, are not that happy by the Free French presence. Perhaps with a small improvement of their living conditions and the help of the pied-noir settlers we could integrate them in the National Community?"

	date = { day = 15 month = september year = 1948 }
	offset = 25
	deathdate = { day = 1 month = december year = 1960 }

	action = {
		ai_chance = 40
		name = "Integrate the Algerian at all costs, we are all Frenchs!"

		command = { type = setflag which = IntegrationALG }

		command = { type = dissent value = 10 }

		command = { type = set_domestic which = freedom value = 8  }

		command = { type = addcore which = 727 } #Algeri
		command = { type = addcore which = 728 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 729 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 730 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 731 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 732 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 733 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 734 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 735 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 736 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 743 }

		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 727 value = 25  } #Algeri
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 728 value = 25  }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 729 value = 25  }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 730 value = 25  }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 731 value = 25  }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 732 value = 25  }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 733 value = 25  }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 734 value = 25  }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 735 value = 25  }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 736 value = 25  }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 743 value = 25  }

		command = { type = wakeminister which = 820091 }
		command = { type = wakeminister which = 820092 }
		command = { type = wakeleader which = 820097 }

		command = { type = money value = -1000  }
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = -10 }
		command = { type = energypool value = -500 }
	}

	action = {
		ai_chance = 30
		name = "France is so close ... I won't spend any money on Algeria."

		command = { type = setflag which = OppressionALG }
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }

	}

	action = {
		name = "A most clever move!"
		ai_chance = 30

		command = { type = setflag which = EmancipationALG }

		#command = { type = removeclaim which = 727 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 728 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 729 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 730 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 731 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 732 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 733 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 734 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 735 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 736 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 743 }

		command = { type = independence which = ALG value = 1 }
		command = { type = make_puppet which = ALG }

		command = { type = relation which = USA value = 25 } #anti-colonialist stance of the USA
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = -5 } #UK see it as supporting similar demands from theirs africans colonies
	}
}

# 311 - The department of Tunisia
event = {
	id = 311
	random = no
	country = U01
	style = 2
	picture = "news_paper"

	name = "The department of Tunisia"
	desc = "The Beylicat of Tunis is less and less popular, thanks to a better treatment of the locals indigenous by the French authorities. With the influx of the refugees from French State established there and the support of the old 'pieds-noirs' community, we could very well abolish the protectorate and integrate Tunisia in de jure France. Howewer, it would mean give to the locals Arabs and ethnics frenchs equals rights, including voting right, to placate them."

	date = { day = 1 month = may year = 1949 }
	offset = 90
	deathdate = { day = 1 month = december year = 1960 }

	decision = {
		NOT = {
			exists = TUN
		}
		flag = Departments
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		NOT = { war = { country = U01 country = FRA } }
		flag = Departments
	}

	trigger = {
		exists = FRA
		event = 310
		flag = Departments
	}

	action = {
		ai_chance = 40
		name = "Integrate the Tunisian at all costs, we are all Frenchs!"

		command = { type = addcore   which = 740  }
		command = { type = addcore   which = 741  }
		command = { type = addcore   which = 742  }
		command = { type = addcore   which = 744  }
		command = { type = addcore   which = 745  }
		command = { type = addcore   which = 746  }
		command = { type = addcore   which = 747  }
		command = { type = addcore   which = 748  }
		command = { type = addcore   which = 749  }

		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 740 value = 10  }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 741 value = 10  }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 742 value = 10  }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 744 value = 10  }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 745 value = 10  }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 746 value = 10  }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 747 value = 10  }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 748 value = 10  }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 749 value = 10  }

		command = { type = wakeminister which = 820093 }
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }

		command = { type = money value = -500  }
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = -5 }
		command = { type = energypool value = -200 }

		command = { type = setflag which = IntegrationTUN }

	}

	action = {
		ai_chance = 30
		name = "France is so close... I won't spend any money on Tunisia"

		command = { type = dissent value = 3 }
		command = { type = setflag which = OppressionTUN }
	}

	action = {
		name = "A most clever move!"
		ai_chance = 30

		command = { type = setflag which = EmancipationTUN }

		command = { type = removeclaim which = 740 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 741 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 742 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 743 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 744 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 745 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 746 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 747 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 748 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 749 }

		command = { type = independence which = TUN value = 1 }
		command = { type = make_puppet which = TUN }

		command = { type = relation which = USA value = 25 } #anti-colonialist stance of the USA
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = -5 } #UK see it as supporting similar demands from theirs africans colonies
	}
}

# 317 - The department of Morocco
event = {
	id = 317
	random = no
	save_date = yes
	country = U01

	name = "The department of Morocco"
	desc = "Morocco is a french protectorate and country's soldiers fought vaillantly in both World War in the name of our Republic, but now that we are at peace, the Sultan Mohammed Ben Youssef is joining the nationalists, in a threatening move. The Pasha of Marrakesh, El Glaoui, have an interesting proposition: make him Grand Vizir, replace the current Sultan, and give the protectorate more freedom in its domestic affair, while keeping an important role in the army and control of the kingdom's diplomatics relations."
	style = 2
	picture = "news_paper"
	decision_picture = "decision_bananawars"

	decision = {
		NOT = {
			exists = MOR
		}
		flag = Departments
		event = 1808
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		NOT = { war = { country = U01 country = FRA } }
		flag = Departments
		event = 1808
	}

	trigger = {
		NOT = { war = { country = U01 country = FRA } }
		event = 1808
		flag = Departments
	}

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1948 }
	offset = 20
	deathdate = { day = 12 month = march year = 1966 }

	action = {
		name = "A most clever move!"
		ai_chance = 60
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 721 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 717 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 724 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 718 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 722 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 725 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 726 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 723 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 987 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 715 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 988 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 989 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 719 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 716 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 720 }
		command = { type = independence which = MOR value = 1 }
		command = { type = make_puppet which = MOR }
		command = { type = trigger which = 318 }
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = 25 } #anti-colonialist stance of the USA
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = -5 } #UK see it as supporting similar demands from theirs africans colonies
		command = { type = setflag which = EmancipationMOR }
	}
	action = {
		name = "Ridiculous. If Mohammed Ben Youssef try anything, we will act in force; we didn't need the help of a local notable."
		ai_chance = 30
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = 25 } #same policy with UK
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = -5 } #anti-colonialist stance of the USA
		command = { type = setflag which = OppressionMOR }
	}
	action = {
		name = "If they want their independance, they will have it!"
		ai_chance = 5
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 721 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 717 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 724 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 718 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 722 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 725 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 726 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 723 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 987 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 715 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 988 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 989 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 719 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 716 }
		command = { type = removeclaim which = 720 }
		command = { type = independence which = MOR value = 1 }
		command = { type = end_mastery which = MOR }
		command = { type = setflag which = FreeMOR }
		command = { type = trigger which = 324 }
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = 50 } #anti-colonialist stance of the USA
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = -15 }  #UK see it as supporting similar demands from theirs africans colonies
	}
	action = {
		ai_chance = 5
		name = "Integrate the Morocaine at all costs, we are all Frenchs!"

		command = { type = addcore   which = 721  }
		command = { type = addcore   which = 717  }
		command = { type = addcore   which = 724  }
		command = { type = addcore   which = 718  }
		command = { type = addcore   which = 722  }
		command = { type = addcore   which = 725  }
		command = { type = addcore   which = 726  }
		command = { type = addcore   which = 723  }
		command = { type = addcore   which = 987  }
		command = { type = addcore which = 715 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 988 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 989 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 719 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 716 }
		command = { type = addcore which = 720 }

		command = { type = province_revoltrisk   which = 721 value = 20 }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk   which = 717 value = 20 }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk   which = 724 value = 20 }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk   which = 718 value = 20 }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk   which = 722 value = 20 }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk   which = 725 value = 20 }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk   which = 726 value = 20 }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk   which = 723 value = 20 }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk   which = 987 value = 20 }
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 715 value = 20}
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 988 value = 20}
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 989 value = 20}
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 719 value = 20}
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 716 value = 20}
		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 720 value = 20}

		command = { type = wakeminister which = 820093 }
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }

		command = { type = money value = -700  }
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = -5 }
		command = { type = energypool value = -600 }

		command = { type = setflag which = IntegrationMOR }

	}
}

# 318 # MOR # A New Statut
event = {
	id = 318
	random = no
	country = MOR
	style = 2
	save_date = yes

	name = "The New Statut"
	desc = "The rights of our state have been extended under the wise guidance of the French Republic and of our new Grand Vizir, El Glaoui. Howewer, it also means a change in the country leadership, including the depart of the current Sultan."
	picture = "news_paper"

	action = {
		name = "ACTION_NAME_GREAT"
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 505046 }
		command = { type = headofstate which = 505047 }
		command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 505048 }
		command = { type = flag_ext which = "_pro" where = MOR }
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 505001 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = U01 value = 200 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = USA value = 150 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = ENG value = 150 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = GER value = -200 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = FRA value = -150 }
		command = { type = set_relation which = ITA value = -150 }
		command = { type = construct which = ic where = 717 value = 5 }
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 319 }
	}
}

# 319 # GER # Mohammed V seeks asylum
event = {
	id = 319
	random = no
	country = GER
	style = 2
	save_date = yes

	name = "Mohammed V seeks asylum" #flavour event
	desc = "The Sultan of Morokko, Mohammed Ben Youssef, seeks asylum and support in Germany against the French oppressors of the Moroccan people after being dethroned for nationalism. Even if we are not really interested in Morokko, we could still use him for propaganda purpose, and show to the world the real face of the capitalists and imperialists of 'Free France'."
	picture = "news_paper"

	action = {
		ai_chance = 75
		name = "Welcome here!"
		command = { type = relation which = U01 value = -50 }
		command = { type = belligerence which = GER value = -1 }
		command = { type = money value = -10  }
	}

	action = {
		ai_chance = 25
		name = "Don't bother me with such unimportants demands."
		command = { type = relation which = U01 value = 5 }
	}
}

# 320 # U01 # The Moroccan Uprising
event = {
	id = 320
	random = no
	country = U01

	trigger = {	flag = OppressionMOR
	}

	name = "The Moroccan Uprising"
	desc = "The Sultan of Morocco launch today at the Great Mosque of Casablanca an appeal 'to all the faithfull', to kick off 'the French oppressor of the sacred land' of the protectorate. According to our resident-general, situation is concerning, with locals communists supporting the movement..."
	style = 2
	picture = "news_paper"

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1949 }
	offset = 90
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		name = "ACTION_NAME_DAMN"
		command = { type = leave_alliance when = 1 } #leave eventaully old alliance wars
		command = { type = independence which = MOR value = 1 when = 0 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = MOR value = 717 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = MOR value = 718 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = MOR value = 722 }
		command = { type = dissent value = 10 }
	}
}

# 321 # MOR # Independance
event = {
	id = 321
	random = no
	country = MOR
	style = 2
	picture = "news_paper"

	trigger = {
		event = 320
	}

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1949 }
	offset = 2
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }

	name = "Independance!"
	desc = "We have revolted and are fighting for our future! Death to the colonialists oppressors!"

	action_a = {
		name = "We will fight for freedom!"
		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 3 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 7 }
		command = { type = headofstate which = 505001 }
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 505016 }
		command = { type = chiefofnavy which = 505039 }
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = 200 }
		command = { type = province_keypoints which = 722 value = 1 } # Marrakech
		command = { type = add_corps which = "1ère Armée Marocaine" value = land when = -1 where = 717 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "1st Morocco Infantry Division" value = infantry when = 9 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "2nd Morocco Infantry Division" value = infantry when = 9 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "1st Morocco Cavalry Division" value = cavalry when = 8 }
		command = { type = add_corps which = "2ème Armée Marocaine" value = land when = -1 where = 718 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "3rd Morocco Infantry Division" value = infantry when = 9 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "4th Morocco Infantry Division" value = militia when = 4 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "5th Morocco Infantry Division" value = militia when = 4 }
		command = { type = add_corps which = "3ème Armée Marocaine" value = land when = -1 where = 722 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "6th Morocco Infantry Division" value = infantry when = 9 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "7th Morocco Infantry Division" value = militia when = 4 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "8th Morocco Infantry Division" value = militia when = 4 }
		command = { type = construct which = ic where = 717 value = 5 }
		command = { type = supplies value = 2500 }
		command = { type = oilpool value = 2500 }
		command = { type = metalpool value = 2500 }
		command = { type = energypool value = 5000 }
		command = { type = rarematerialspool value = 2500 }
		command = { type = war which = U01 }
	}
}

# 322 # U01 # Morocco is winning
event = {
	id = 322
	random = no
	country = U01
	style = 2
	picture = "news_paper"

	trigger = {
		control = { province = 721 data = MOR }
		control = { province = 717 data = MOR }
		control = { province = 724 data = MOR }
		control = { province = 718 data = MOR }
		control = { province = 722 data = MOR }
		control = { province = 725 data = MOR }
		control = { province = 726 data = MOR }
		control = { province = 723 data = MOR }
		control = { province = 719 data = MOR }
		control = { province = 720 data = MOR }
		control = { province = 729 data = MOR }
		control = { province = 733 data = MOR }
		control = { province = 739 data = MOR }
	}

	name = "Morocco is winning!"
	desc = "Moroccan rebels have succesfully take control of the protectorate, and are even advancing in Algeria. We must end this situation quickly, or the Algerians nationalists will rises too, and we may lost control of our empire... Should we seek peace?"

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 75
		name = "We must accept their victory..."
		command = { type = peace which = MOR value = 0 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = MOR value = 721 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = MOR value = 717 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = MOR value = 724 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = MOR value = 718 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = MOR value = 722 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = MOR value = 725 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = MOR value = 726 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = MOR value = 723 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = MOR value = 719 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = MOR value = 720 }
		command = { type = dissent value = 15 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 325 }
	}

	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 25
		name = "This is only a temporay setback. Onwards to victory!"
		command = { type = dissent value = 10 }
	}
}

# 323 # U01 # Moroccan rebellion crushed
event = {
	id = 323
	random = no
	country = U01
	style = 2
	save_date = yes
	picture = "news_paper"

	trigger = {
		event = 321
		control = { province = 717 data = U01 }
		control = { province = 718 data = U01 }
		control = { province = 722 data = U01 }
		NOT = { exists = MOR
		}
	}

	name = "Maroccan rebellion crushed"
	desc = "Our glorious armed forces defeated moroccan rabble, regaining control of our colony!"

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 20
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1966 }

	action_a = {
		name = "ACTION_NAME_GREAT"
		command = { type = dissent value = -10 }
		command = { type = alliance which = USA }
		command = { type = construct which = ic where = 717 value = -5 }
	}
}

# 324 # MOR # A New Marocco (Peaceful independance)
event = {
	id = 324
	random = no
	country = MOR
	style = 2
	save_date = yes

	name = "A New Morocco"
	desc = "The French oppressors finally accept our independance without war. Praise our Sultan Mohammed V for this achievement!"
	picture = "news_paper"

	action = {
		name = "ACTION_NAME_GREAT"
		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 3 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 7 }
		command = { type = headofstate which = 505001 }
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 505016 }
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 505047 }
		command = { type = construct which = ic where = 717 value = 5 }
		command = { type = setflag which = MORfreeG }
		command = { type = add_corps which = "1ère Armée Marocaine" value = land when = -1 where = 717 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "1st Morocco Infantry Division" value = infantry when = 9 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "2nd Morocco Infantry Division" value = infantry when = 9 }
		command = { type = add_division which = "1st Morocco Cavalry Division" value = cavalry when = 8 }
	}
}

# 325 # MOR # A New Marocco (Warmonger independence)

	id = 325
	random = no
	country = MOR
	style = 2
	save_date = yes

	desc = "Our Great Sultan Mohammed V lead us to victory against french oppressors! Glory to him and Morroco!"
	picture = "news_paper"

	action = {
		name = "ACTION_NAME_GREAT"
		command = { type = headofstate which = 505001 }
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 505016 }
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 505047 }
		command = { type = setflag which = MORfreeF }
	}
}

#########################################
# Arts & Sciences
#########################################

event = {
	id = 326
	random = no
	country = U01
	style = 2

	date = { day = 27 month = july year = 1962 }

	name = "Cheikh Raymond, the Concorde Musician"
	desc = "Today is Raymond Leyris' 50th birthday! Better known as Cheikh Raymond, he is a renowned Algerian Jewish musician, specialized in 'malouf' music and 'oud' (the lute), widely respected by both Jews and Muslims, who gave him his title of 'Cheikh' (elder). His father was a Jew from Batna who died during WW1, and his mother a French citizen , an example of the multicultural blending of French Algeria. He plays his repertoire throughout the country, including the famous song 'Malahbibi Malou'."

	action = {
		name = "Great!"
		command = { type = dissent value = -1 }
	}
}

#########################################
# Communist agitation
#########################################
# 327 # U01 # Congress of the Algerian Communist Party (PCA)
event = {
	id = 327
	random = no
	country = U01
	style = 2

	name = "Congress of the Algerian Communist Party (PCA)"
	desc = "The secretary general Larbi Bouhali opened the Congress of the Algerian Communist Party by stating that 'the future of Algeria will be decided primarily by the struggle of our people on our national soil'. Composed of a majority of Arabs and some Europeans, it is still a hotbed of seditious and anti-colonialist elements, even after Moscow supported a purge of the most nationalistic elements including the then secretary general Amar Ouzegane in support of our struggle against the Third Reich last year."
	picture = "news_paper"

	trigger = {
		flag = OppressionALG
	}

	date = { day = 14 month = march year = 1949 }
	offset = 100
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = march year = 1999 }


	action = {
		name = "Well, I suppose it could be worse…"

		command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 727 value = 25  } #Algeri

		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }

		command = { type = money value = -50 }
	}
}

# 328 # U01 # Strike supported by the PCA
event = {
	id = 328
	random = no
	country = U01

	trigger = {
		random = 5
		dissent = 0
		atwar = no
		NOT = { dissent = 10 }
	}

	name = "A new strike, supported by the PCA!"
	desc = "Dozens of workers stopped to work today, interrupting their factory's production and demanding better working conditions, wages and the end of 'the inequalities between Arabs and Pieds-Noirs', supported by the Algerian Communist Party (PCA)."
	style = 2
	picture = "news_paper"

	persistent = yes
	date = { day = 1 month = october year = 1949 }
	offset = 100
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1970 }

	action = {
		name = "Placate them one way or another, stability is paramount!"
		command = { type = dissent value = 1 }
	}
}

#########################################
# The Constitutionnal Order of the Exiled France
#########################################

# 329-331 # U01 # Free France's starting events (player only)
event = {
	id = 329
	random = no
	country = U01
	style = 2

	trigger = {
		
	}

	name = "France's difficult Challenge..."
	desc = "With France apparently divided for long, De Gaulle's Free France had to adapt, and began to govern France's far-flung colonies without the strength of the metropolis. The loss of the mainland against Germany, of Indochina against the Japanese and the infighting among Pétainist and Gaullist French colonials changed considerably how the natives resented French rule, leading to unrest in most colonies, and the independence of Syria and Lebanon in the Levant after the League of Nations mandate collapse."
	picture = "news_paper"

	date = { day = 25 month = january year = 1948 }

	action_a = {
		name = "What are France's institutions?"
		command = { type = trigger which = 330 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 330
	random = no
	country = U01
	style = 2

	name = "The Constitutionnal Order of the Exiled France"
	desc = "The Provisional Government reformed itself after the end of the hostilities into the 'French Union', including the Republic (of which mainly Algeria is controlled), 'territories d'Outre-mer' (ex-colonies), and 'associated States' (ex-protectorates). The natives gain the right to vote, but in a different ballot than the one reserved to ethnic French and selected natives (civil servants, graduates, traditional elites…), and end up with less delegates despite representing around 95% of the total population."
	picture = "news_paper"

	action_a = {
		name = "France is still the beacon of Civilization!"
		command = { type = trigger which = 331 }
	}
}


event = {
	id = 331
	random = no
	country = U01
	style = 2

	name = "The French presence in Indochina"
	desc = "After the Treaty of Oran, signed by Georges Bidault and Ho Chi Minh, Viet Nam, Laos and Cambodia joined the French Union as 'associated states', with independent armies, parliaments and finances. Viet Nam, of which Annam and Cochinchina are recognized integral parts but remain under colonial rule, became a constitutional monarchy headed by the Emperor Duy Tan, exiled in 1916 for nationalism, and gained exclusive control of Tonkin while France is committed to fully withdraw from Indochina in July 1951."
	picture = "news_paper"

	action_a = {
		name = "Breaking France's words could have a disastrous effect!"
		command = { }
	}
}







########################################
# New events - Mutuated from Kaiserreich
########################################
# 130000 - Allies giving Metropolitan French territory to Free France
# 130001 - The Reconquest of France Proper
# 130006 - The Algeria-Central Africa Census and Inventory
# 130007 - The Algeria-Central Africa Census Complete
# 130008 - The Algeria-Central Africa Inventory Complete
# 130009 - The Tamanghasset Incident
# 130010 - Tuareg Revolt
# 130011 - Tuareg Revolt - ALG
# 130012 - The Terror - ALG
# 130013 - The Terror
# 130014 - Unrest on the Gold Coast
# 130015 - War in the south
# 130016 - Free France in Chaos
# 130017 - The Algerians Raid the Atlas
# 130018 - Independence - GUI
# 130019 - Southern Conscription
# 130020 - The Dakar to Algiers Airways
# 130021 - Expanding the Dakar Algiers Airways
# 130022 - The Dakar Algiers Airways Goes Bankrupt
# 130023 - The Dakar Algiers Airways is a Success

event = {
	id = 130000
	tag = { USA CAN ENG AST NZL SAF POR }
	persistent = yes
	style = 2

	trigger = {
		region = { region = FRANCE country = -1 data = 2 value = 1 }
		alliance = { country = U01 country = -1 }
		NOT = {
			ispuppet = U01
			exists = FRA
		}
	}

	name = "The Liberation of Metropolitan France"
	desc = "We currently control territory in Metropolitan France belonging to our stalwart Free French allies. We should return the provinces under our control to them."
	picture = "france_liberated"

	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1936 }
	offset = 3
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1970 }


	action = {
		ai_chance =  100
		name = "Return the provinces."
		command = { type = secederegion which = U01 value = FRANCE when = 1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 1 }
		command = { type = relation which = U01 value = 150 }
		command = { type = dissent value = -1  }
	}

	action = {
		ai_chance =  0
		name = "No."
		command = { type = relation which = U01 value = -50 }
		command = { type = dissent value = 10  }
	}
}

	country = U01

			exists = FRA
		}

event = {
	id = 130006
	random = no
	country = U01

	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			exists = ALG
		}
		#technology = { country = U01 value = 5320 } #Basic computing is known...
	}

	name = "The Algeria-Central Africa Census and Inventory"
	desc = "The French Government-in-Exile has always had a tough economic situation, leading to several rather outlandish projects in order to gain more funds. Some bright young thing in a government agency has come up with an idea to make a census and an inventory of the Sahara region. Some rather dry government official got word of this, and one thing led to another, now it has reached the upper levels of the government. Perhaps we should send out government officials and expeditions?"
	style = 2
	picture = "Algerians"

	date = { day = 0 month = january year = 1950 }
	offset = 100
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 90
		name = "An excellent idea!"
		command = { type = supplies value = -10 }
		command = { type = money value = -10 }
	}

	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 10
		name = "There has never been anything in these deserts and there never will!"
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 130007 }
		command = { type = sleepevent which = 130008 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 130007
	random = no
	country = U01

	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			exists = ALG
		}
		event = 130006
		#technology = { country = U01 value = 5320 } #Basic computing is known...
	}

	name = "The Algeria-Central Africa Census Complete"
	desc = "The census of the Sahara region is complete. The population mainly consists of nomadic Tuareg herders and caravan drivers. One possible source of income is to levy taxes on the tuareg caravans."
	style = 2
	picture = "sahara"

	date = { day = 0 month = june year = 1951 }
	offset = 100
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = september year = 1963 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 80
		name = "Tax the caravans and herders, conduct drafts"
		command = { type = supplies value = 20 }
		command = { type = money value = 20 }
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = 5 }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = tuareg_caravans_taxed }
	}

	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 20
		name = "This is not worth the effort"
		command = { }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 130008
	random = no
	country = U01

	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			exists = ALG
		}
		event = 130006
		#technology = { country = U01 value = 5320 } #Basic computing is known...
	}

	name = "The Algeria-Central Africa Inventory Complete"
	desc = "The inventory of the Sahara region is complete. Initial testing has shown some possible oil deposits and rare metals. However, these are too far removed to be effectively exploited for longer periods."
	style = 2
	picture = "failed_objective"

	date = { day = 0 month = june year = 1951 }
	offset = 100
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = september year = 1963 }

	action_a = {
		name = "One day it will be fully exploited"
		command = { type = oilpool value = 100 }
		command = { type = rarematerialspool value = 100 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 130009
	random = no
	country = U01

	trigger = {
		local_flag = tuareg_caravans_taxed
		NOT = {
			exists = ALG
		}
	}

	name = "The Tamanghasset Incident"
	desc = "A party of tax collectors have been murdered near the city of Tamaghasset in the Sahara. The perpetrators are without any doubt Algerians, discontent with the rightful taxes levied upon their caravans."
	style = 2
	picture = "Captured_Supplies3"

	date = { day = 1 month = march year = 1952 }
	offset = 100
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = september year = 1958 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 90
		name = "Fight back!"
		command = { type = event which = 130010 where = U01 when = 2  }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = tuareg_caravans_taxed }
	}

	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 10
		name = "Suck in our Pride and Repeal the Caravan Tax"
		command = { type = supplies value = -20 }
		command = { type = money value = -20 }
		command = { type = dissent value = 10 }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = tuareg_caravans_taxed }
	}
}

		name = "Wait and see"
		command = { type = independence which = ALG value = 1 }
		command = { type = event which = 130011 where = ALG when = 1  }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 130012
	random = no
	country = ALG

	name = "The Terror"
	desc = "Following the initial Algerian uprising, little happened apart from a few clashes with French troops. Then, all of a sudden, large bands of Algerians swept in from the desert, pillaging everything in sight."
	style = 2
	picture = "Captured_Supplies3"

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 95
		name = "Pillage as far south as the Niger"
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = -5 }
		command = { type = supplies value = 50 } #loot
		command = { type = money value = 10 } #loot

		command = { type = trigger which = 130013 }
	}

		ai_chance = 5
		name = "Raid the Atlas mountains"

		command = { type = supplies value = 25 } #loot
		command = { type = money value = 5 } #loot

	}
}

event = {
	id = 130013
	random = no
	country = U01

	name = "The Terror"
	desc = "Following the initial Algerian uprising, little happened apart from a few clashes with french troops. Then, all of a sudden, large bands of Algerians swept in from the desert, pillaging, burning and raping everything in sight. When they reached the Niger, they stopped and settled in."
	style = 2
	picture = "captured_supplies3"

	action_a = {
		name = "Those Algerians will not go unpunished!"
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ALG value = 984 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ALG value = 985 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ALG value = 946 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ALG value = 982 }

		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ALG value = 944 }
		command = { type = secedeprovince which = ALG value = 947 }

		command = {
			trigger = {
				NOT = {
					war = { country = U01 country = GER }
				}
			} type = leave_alliance when = 1 }

			command = { type = war which = ALG }
			command = { type = trigger which = 130014 }
		}
	}

		id = 130014

			event = 130014
		}

		offset = 2
		deathdate = { day = 29 month = september year = 1963 }

				} type = leave_alliance when = 1 }

			}

		### Dakar to Algiers Airways
		event = {
			id = 130020
			random = no
			country = U01

			trigger = {
				exists = FRA
				control = { province = 978 data = U01 }
				control = { province = 727 data = U01 }
			}

			name = "The Dakar to Algiers Airways"
			desc = "The Dakar to Algiers Airways was the brain child of Felix Amiot and was designed to kick start the economy in the south of the nation. The competition with German and South African businesses had been a problem for the struggling French businesses and Amiot wanted to help. He was hoping that a new airways could bring more business to North Africa. The government is not necessarily ready to invest in this plan as it comes with considerable risk."
			style = 2
			picture = "condor"

			date = { day = 21 month = april year = 1952 }
			offset = 4
			deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }

			action_a = {
				name = "This is worth the risk"
				ai_chance = 80
				command = { type = peacetime_ic_mod value = 2 }
			}

			action_b = {
				name = "No thanks. We have enough nutty projects."
				ai_chance = 20
				command = { type = sleepevent which = 130021 }
			}
		}

		### The Dakar Algiers Airways expansion
		event = {
			id = 130021
			random = no
			country = U01

			trigger = {
				event = 130020
			}

			name = "Expanding the Dakar Algiers Airways"
			desc = "The success of the DAA has led to Amiot wanting to expand it throughout Africa. Amiot wishes to expand in every direction but a more limited expansion might be the best approach. We will need to make a major investment in this plan to expand as Amiot wants."
			style = 2
			picture = "condor"

			date = { day = 14 month = april year = 1953 }
			offset = 1
			deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year= 1960 }

			action_a = {
				name = "Let us expand for the future of France"
				ai_chance = 75
				command = { type = money value = -20 }
				command = { type = oilpool value = -200 }
				command = { type = supplies value = -200 }
				command = { type = metalpool value = -200 }
				command = { type = local_setflag which = daaallexp }
			}

			action_b = {
				name = "Let us limit the expansion"
				ai_chance = 25
				command = { type = money value = -5 }
				command = { type = oilpool value = -20 }
				command = { type = supplies value = -20 }
				command = { type = metalpool value = -20 }
				command = { type = local_setflag which = daalimexp }
			}
		}

		### The DAA crashes and burns
		event = {
			id = 130022
			random = no
			country = U01

			trigger = {
				local_flag = daaallexp
			}

			name = "The Dakar Algiers Airways Goes Bankrupt"
			desc = "The effort to expand the DAA has led to massive mismanagement and the bankruptcy of the business. Amiot is blaming the managers as being corrupt and in the pocket of German businessmen. This is a disaster for us."
			style = 2
			picture = "unemployment2"

			date = { day = 12 month = march year = 1954 }
			offset = 4
			deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year= 1960 }

			action_a = {
				name = "Arrest the managers"
				ai_chance = 90
				command = { type = dissent value = 2 }
				command = { type = local_clrflag which = daaallexp }
			}

			action_b = {
				name = "This is our fault"
				ai_chance = 10
				command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
				command = { type = local_clrflag which = daaallexp }
			}
		}

		### Limited expansion is a success
		event = {
			id = 130023
			random = no
			country = U01

			trigger = {
				local_flag = daalimexp
			}

			name = "The Dakar Algiers Airways is a Success"
			desc = "By not overextending our resources we have successfully expanded the DAA throughout Western Africa. German and South African competition has tapered off and we will soon control most of the market."
			style = 2
			picture = "condor"

			date = { day = 12 month = march year = 1954 }
			offset = 3
			deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year= 1960 }

			action_a = {
				name = "Fabulous"
				command = { type = money value = 150 }
				command = { type = industrial_modifier which = total value = 5 }
				command = { type = construct which = IC where = 978 value = 1 }
				command = { type = construct which = IC where = 727 value = 1 }
				command = { type = local_clrflag which = daalimexp }
			}
		}

		#  Opening of Moroccan-Tunisian Railway

			}
		}

		###############
		# Outlaw French Communist Party
		event = {
			id = 9300099
			random = no
			country = U01

			decision = {
				war = { country = GER country = FRA }
				government = democratic
			}

			decision_trigger = { }

			trigger = {
				war = { country = GER country = FRA }
				government = democratic
				random = 60
			}

			name = "9300099name"
			desc = "9300099desc"
			style = 2
			picture = "Thorez"
			decision_picture = "decision_fireside_chat"

			date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1950 }
			offset = 60
			deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

			action = {
				name = ACTION_NAME_GREAT
				command = { type = dissent value = 1 }
				command = { type = relation which = SOV value = -30 }
			}
		}
		###############
		# De Gaulle's 'Toward a Professional Army'
		event = {
			id = 9300100
			random = no
			country = U01

			trigger = {
				atwar = no
				OR = { random = 10 year = 1953 }
			}

			name = "9300100name"
			desc = "9300100desc"
			style = 2
			picture = "DeGaulle"

			date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1949 }
			offset = 60
			deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }

			action = {
				ai_chance = 100
				name = 9300100b
				command = { trigger = { ai = no } type = dissent value = 5 }
				command = { type = chiefofstaff which = 5126 } # De Gaulle
				command = { trigger = { NOT = { technology = 6900 } } type = gain_tech which = 6900 } # Armor Formation Doctrine
				command = { trigger = { NOT = { technology = 2650 } } type = gain_tech which = 2650 } # L ARM 1934
				command = { trigger = { NOT = { technology = 2030 } } type = gain_tech which = 2030 } # L ARM 1936
			}
		}

		#########################################################################
		#  Expansion of ports in Dakar and Algiers
		#########################################################################
		event = {
			id = 9009
			random = no
			country = U01
			save_date = yes

			decision = {
				local_flag = fra_colonies
				control = { province = 978 } # Dakar
				control = { province = 727 } # Algiers
				NOT = { atwar = yes }
			}

			decision_trigger = {
				local_flag = fra_colonies
				control = { province = 978 } # Dakar
				control = { province = 727 } # Algiers
				NOT = { atwar = yes }
			}

			trigger = {
				local_flag = fra_colonies
				control = { province = 978 } # Dakar
				control = { province = 727 } # Algiers
				NOT = { atwar = yes }
			}

			name = "Expansion of ports in Dakar and Algiers"
			desc = "After the Trans-Sahara railroad was completed, traffic accross Africa increased greatly and ports in Dakar and Algiers experienced an increase in shipping. Dakar even became a hub for French trade with South America. The next planned step was the expansion of ports in Dakar and Algiers, which had became too small to accomodate shipping needs."
			style = 0
			picture = "port"
			decision_picture = "decision_invest_infrastructures"

			date = { day = 27 month = march year = 1953 }
			offset = 6
			deathdate = { day = 12 month = march year = 1963 }

			action = {
				name = "Ok"
				command = { }
			}
		}
		#########################################################################
		#  Expansion of ports in Dakar and Algiers completed
		#########################################################################
		event = {
			id = 9010
			random = no
			country = U01
			save_date = yes

			trigger = {
				local_flag = fra_colonies
				control = { province = 978 } # Dakar
				control = { province = 727 } # Algiers
				NOT = { atwar = yes }
				event = { id = 9009 days = 120 }
			}

			name = "Expansion of ports in Dakar and Algiers completed"
			desc = "The planned expansion of ports in Dakar and Algiers is completed."
			style = 0
			picture = "transsahara"

			date = { day = 27 month = march year = 1953 }
			offset = 6
			deathdate = { day = 12 month = march year = 1963 }

			action = {
				name = "Ok"
				command = { type = construct which = infrastructure where = 978 value = 10 } # Dakar
				command = { type = construct which = naval_base where = 978 value = 2 }
				command = { type = construct which = infrastructure where = 727 value = 10 } # Algiers
			}
		}
		#########################################################################
		#  Economic boom in Algiers
		#########################################################################
		event = {
			id = 9011
			random = no
			country = U01

			trigger = {
				local_flag = fra_colonies
				control = { province = 727 } # Algiers
				NOT = { atwar = yes }
				event = { id = 9010 days = 30 }
				random = 50
			}

			name = "Economic boom in Algiers"
			desc = "Our efforts to revitalize our colonies are beginning to show effects. The city of Algiers is experiencing a rapid increase in commercial activity. The population of the city is steadily increasing and its industry is growing, an effect of the expansion of the Trans-Sahara railway and the enlargement of its port."
			style = 2
			picture = "algiers"

			date = { day = 27 month = march year = 1953 }
			offset = 6
			deathdate = { day = 12 month = march year = 1963 }

			action = {
				name = "Excellent"
				command = { type = construct which = ic where = 727 value = 2 } # Algiers
			}
		}
		#########################################################################
		#  Economic boom in Dakar
		#########################################################################
		event = {
			id = 9012
			random = no
			country = U01

			trigger = {
				local_flag = fra_colonies
				control = { province = 978 } # Dakar
				NOT = { atwar = yes }
				event = { id = 9010 days = 30 }
				random = 50
			}

			name = "Economic boom in Dakar"
			desc = "Our efforts to revitalize our colonies are beginning to show effects. The city of Dakar is experiencing a rapid increase in commercial activity. The population of the city is steadily increasing and its industry is growing, an effect of the expansion of the Trans-Sahara railway and the enlargement of its port."
			style = 2
			picture = "algiers"

			date = { day = 27 month = march year = 1953 }
			offset = 6
			deathdate = { day = 12 month = march year = 1963 }

			action = {
				name = "Excellent"
				command = { type = construct which = ic where = 978 value = 2 } # Dakar
			}
		}
